thread.section_title: Euroflorist Norge omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Euroflorist Norge | euroflorist.no | 2 av 368
thread.title: Gary Allen
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Norge anmeldt av Gary Allen

author: Gary Allen
title: Gary Allen
text: From the UK, I ordered some lilies to be sent to my boyfriend staying at a hotel in Bergen, Norway. I ordered the lilies after 17:00 UK GMT to be delivered to the individual the next day. I was sceptical but sure enough, I had a text the following day to tell me the lilies were on their way. My boyfriend received his flowers after lunchtime that day and says they are beautiful. I am very grateful as this was a very easy way of sending flowers to somebody in another country! Thank you very much - tusen takk!
